description: Mouse events, such as click, mousedown, or mousemove, fire when users interact with an input or pointing device such as a mouse, trackpad, or touchscreen.
description_html: Mouse events, such as click, mousedown, or mousemove, fire when users interact with an input or pointing device such as a mouse, trackpad, or touchscreen.
name: Mouse events

firefox.notes: Starting in Firefox 68, the auxclick event is used to trigger the new tab on middle-click action; previously, this had been done with the click event. Apps can prevent middle-click from opening new tabs (or middle-click to paste, if that feature is enabled) by intercepting auxclick on links, and auxclick event handlers can now open popups without triggering the popup blocker.

Beginning in Firefox 68, Firefox no longer incorrectly sends a click event for buttons other than the primary mouse button; previously, there were circumstances in which this would occur. One example: middle-clicking a link would send a click to the document's <html> element.
Starting in Firefox 68, dblclick events are only sent for the primary mouse button, per the specification.

chrome.notes: Before Chrome 19, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs.

chrome_android.notes: Before Chrome Android 25, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs.

notes: Before Firefox 5, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs, and has no effect on text and file inputs.
Starting in Firefox 75, the click() function works even when the element is not attached to a DOM tree.
Before Firefox 5, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs, and has no effect on text and file inputs.
Starting in Firefox for Android 79, the click() function works even when the element is not attached to a DOM tree.

oculus.notes: Before Quest Browser 5.0, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs.

samsunginternet_android.notes: Before Samsung Internet 1.5, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs.

webview_android.notes: Before WebView Android 4.4, click() is only defined on buttons and inputs.
